attributes.action: Bring back people's right to buy council house in Scotland
attributes.background: Would like to see the Scottish government reverse the right to buy council house law, lots of working class people in the country can't afford to go and get 100,000 pound mortgage and are paying expensive rent for mediocre homes, time for this decision to be reversed.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: 

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
